implementation.functions:
function boot(lul_device)
sid = "urn:upnp-org:serviceId:VGhost1"
local oo = luup.variable_get(sid,"OnOff", lul_device) if oo == nil then luup.variable_set(sid,"OnOff","0",lul_device) end
local st = luup.variable_get(sid,"State", lul_device) if st == nil then luup.variable_set(sid,"State","0",lul_device) end
for i=1,8 do lid = luup.variable_get(sid,"LightID" ..i, lul_device) if lid == nil then luup.variable_set(sid,"LightID" ..i,"--",lul_device) end local ts = luup.variable_get(sid,"TimeStart" ..i, lul_device) if ts == nil then luup.variable_set(sid,"TimeStart" ..i,"--",lul_device) end local tst = luup.variable_get(sid,"TimeStop" ..i, lul_device) if tst == nil then luup.variable_set(sid,"TimeStop" ..i,"--",lul_device) end local ot = luup.variable_get(sid,"OnTime" ..i, lul_device) if ot == nil then luup.variable_set(sid,"OnTime" ..i,"--",lul_device) end local ov = luup.variable_get(sid,"OnVariation" ..i, lul_device) if ov == nil then luup.variable_set(sid,"OnVariation" ..i,"--",lul_device) end local op = luup.variable_get(sid,"OnPropability" ..i, lul_device) if op == nil then luup.variable_set(sid,"OnPropability" ..i,"--",lul_device) end local dl = luup.variable_get(sid,"DimLevel" ..i, lul_device) if dl == nil then luup.variable_set(sid,"DimLevel" ..i,"--",lul_device) end local oc = luup.variable_get(sid,"OnCycle" ..i, lul_device) if oc == nil then luup.variable_set(sid,"OnCycle" ..i,"--",lul_device) end end
luup.log("VGinfo: Starting VacationGhost") luup.call_delay('main',1,tonumber(lul_device),1) luup.log("VGinfo: Startup of VacationGhost Plugin ended")
end
